title: Universal Credit Full Service Technology Lead

address.addressLocality: Blackpool, Leeds, London, Manchester, North West, Sheffield, Warrington

description:
DWP is implementing the biggest changes to the welfare system in a generation whilst continuing to drive up service and drive down costs, meeting ambitions to be the best and most efficient delivery function in the public sector by delivering a seamless service to our customers.

The Universal Credit Full Service Technology Lead will play a key leadership role in achieving this.

As this is a leadership role regular travel to DWP hubs may be required.
